title: Meikyuu Toshi no Antique Shop - Novel Updates
tags: Antique Shop   Dungeons   Interconnected Storylines   Magic
author: Ooba Hatotarou   大場鳩太郎
description: A fledgling adventurer is depressed from his most recent, seventy fifth, failure to capture the third floor of the dungeon under Labyrinth City. In his unwariness, he is ambushed by a certain someone, and suddenly his life begins actually progressing again. From a life of bland rain to a life of colorful acquaintances he goes. A series of short stories surrounding an Antique shop outside of Dungeon Gate.>
